name: Invictus Magus
description:
2 local player game invictus magus:

3 different character

2 different map

for Player 1:

W: Jump

S: Fall

A: Left

D: Right

Left ctrl:  Attack

Left shift: Dash

Z: Defend

for Player 2:

Up Arrow: Jump

Down Arrow: Fall

Left Arrow: Left

Right Arrow: Right

Right ctrl: Attack

Right Shift: Dash

Period: Defend

Level Design and Menu UI: memtt

Game Mechanics and Game UI: Tringoala

Sprites:https://maaot.itch.io/
